title: How Animal Crossing: New Horizons' Sound Design Relaxes You
description:
In today's episode JM8 delves into the sound design of Animal Crossing: New Horizons and how it subtly manipulates and guides it players on how to feel.

If you want to see more game design content a new Anatomy episode will release every other week, or you can subscribe to JM8s personal channel for similar content: https://www.youtube.com/c/JM8GameDesign
